sex.Description: sex of the participant as reported by the participant

category_cond.Description: visual category condition the participant belonged to

Levels.OFS: objects were presented three times and faces once during encoding of session 1
Levels.SOF: Scenes were presented three times and objects once during encoding of session 1
Levels.FSO: Faces were presented three times and scenes once during encoding of session 1

test_cond.Description: test and restudy block order condition the participant belonged to

Levels.TR: the 1st encoding block was tested and the 2nd encoding block restudied
Levels.RT: the 1st encoding block was restudied and the 2nd encoding block tested
